title: ‘Halloween’ Franchise Appears To Be Coming Back To Life Again
description:
The Halloween franchise recently came to its most recent conclusion in 2022’s Halloween Ends. The divisive horror film capped off David Gordon Green’s trilogy which also included 2018’s Halloween and 2021’s Halloween Kills. Now Malek Akkad’s Trancas International Films is reportedly shopping around the film and TV rights to Halloween to get the next project […]

The post ‘Halloween’ Franchise Appears To Be Coming Back To Life Again appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Gal Gadot Will Reportedly Return As Wonder Woman For James Gunn’s DCU
description:
Gal Gadot is well-known for her role as the DC character Wonder Woman in the DCEU film of the same name and its follow-up, Wonder Woman 1984. As such, fans have wondered whether or not Gal Gadot would return for the DCU. The DCU, otherwise known as the DC Universe, is a new shared universe […]

The post Gal Gadot Will Reportedly Return As Wonder Woman For James Gunn’s DCU appeared first on ScreenGeek.
